content: Is the sign up page broken for SMART on FHIR sandbox? https://sb-pwm.smarthealthit.org/public/newuser
There are some issues with the server today that we're working on. I'll post an update to the SMART mailing list when everything is working correctly again.
It should be fixed now - let me know if you still get an error!
Great! Thanks for following up! See no errors now.
